Hi,
AFAIK, license details are in [LICENSE.txt](https://github.com/gruntwork-io/terragrunt/blob/master/LICENSE.txt) file in the root of the repository, also can be checked [contact](https://gruntwork.io/contact) and [support](https://gruntwork.io/support/) pages
